manifest.name: parse5-htmlparser2-tree-adapter

scripts.build:cjs: tsc --module CommonJS --target ES6 --outDir dist/cjs && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json

manifest.readme:
parse5-htmlparser2-tree-adapter

htmlparser2 tree adapter for parse5.

npm install --save parse5-htmlparser2-tree-adapter
